info.title: SeeBotRun Link
info.description: Create and manage short links dynamically for your SeeBotRun Link account, using provided or custom domains.

name.description: The friendly name of the link.
name.title: Name

path.description: The path for the link used for the redirect.
path.title: Path

redirect.description: The redirect result for the link when visited by a user.
redirect.title: Redirect

health_status.description: The current health status of the link.
health_status.title: Health Status

cache.description: Boolean value to turn caching on or off for the given link.
cache.title: Cache

health_checked_at.description: The date/time the health status of the link was checked.
health_checked_at.title: Health Last Checked At

domain_id.description: The ID for the associated domain.
domain_id.title: Domain ID

generated_url.description: The automatically generated URL based on the domain's URL and the link's path.
generated_url.title: Generated URL

id.description: The unique ID for the domain.
id.title: Domain ID

name.description: The friendly name for the domain.
name.title: Domain Name

scope.description: The system scope level for the domain.
scope.title: Domain Scope

default_root_url.description: Default Root URL used by the domain.
default_root_url.title: Default Root URL

default_catchall_url.description: Default Catchall URL used by the domain.
default_catchall_url.title: Default Catchall URL

total.description: The total number of links in the result set, regardless of paging.
total.title: Results Total

count.description: The total number of links available for the current page.
count.title: Count

page.description: The current page for the result set.
page.title: Results Page

pages.description: The total pages available based on the per_page and total parameters.
pages.title: Results Total Pages

per_page.description: The number of links to return for a given page.
per_page.title: Results Per Page

order.description: The field the ordering is based on.
order.title: Results Ordering

sort.description: The sorting direction to use, in combination with the order parameter.
sort.title: Results Sorting

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: The content type provided on the request.

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: The type of data accepted from the request.

parameters.name: X-SBR-UserID
parameters.description: The user account ID, used for verification.

parameters.name: X-SBR-TokenKey
parameters.description: The account token key, used for verification.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page of results to return.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: The number of items to return per paged results.

parameters.name: search_types
parameters.description: Comma separated list of types to search for.

parameters.name: domain_id
parameters.description: The Domain ID to return links for.

delete.description: Delete an existing predefined link based on the link ID and key.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The Link ID of the predefined link being deleted.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The unique key for the predefined link being deleted.

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: The content type provided on the request.

parameters.description: The type of data acceptedreate from the request.

id.description: The unique ID for the predefined link.
id.title: ID

key.description: The unique key for the predefined link.
key.title: Key

path.description: The path used in the generated redirect for the predefined link.
path.title: Path

redirect.description: The redirect used when a user visits the predefined link.
redirect.title: Redirect

notes.description: Internal notes used by administrators for the predefined link.
notes.title: Notes

link_id.description: The associated link ID for the predefined link.
link_id.title: Link ID

client_id.description: The associated client ID for the predefined link.
client_id.title: Client ID

created_at.description: The date/time the predefined link was created.
created_at.title: Created At

updated_at.description: The date/time the predefined link was last updated.
updated_at.title: Updated At

post.description: Create a predefined link within a short link for a given key.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The Link ID of the predefined link being created/updated.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key of the predefined link being created/updated.

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: The content type provided on the request.

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: The type of data accepted from the request.

parameters.name: X-SBR-UserID
parameters.description: The user account ID, used for verification.

parameters.name: X-SBR-TokenKey
parameters.description: The account token key, used for verification.

path.description: The path for the predefined link.
path.title: Path

redirect.description: The redirect for the predefined link.
redirect.title: Redirect

notes.description: Any notes in reference to the predefined link.
notes.title: Notes
